DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Common tern chick telomere lengths
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Telomere length, body mass, sex, hatching order, brood size and fledging success for common tern chicks measured in 2013 and 2014, at an age of 3 and 20 days.
